name: Roam'n Rampage (NoahMT)
description:
A mixture of wave survival combat and pinball! Play as a Roman gladiator fighting for their life in a Colosseum full of Egyptian Mummies!

Kick your enemies into the pits to score points but be careful not to get knocked into a pit yourself!

Controls:

Mouse - Use Menus

Xbox Controller

Left Joystick - Move Player

Right Joystick - Aim Player

Right Bumper - Hold Down to charge up your kick power and release to unleash your kick attack

Credits:

Designers - Noah Mendelsohn-Thornton & Uriah Overton

Artists - Nicole Harvey,  Sean Rogers, Tristan Milverton, Harry Lister,  Kira Walters

Programmers - Lachlan Wernert, Will Hart
